title: Ep 72: Fashion Stylist Linda Rodin of Rodin Olio Lusso
itunes:title: Ep 72: Fashion Stylist Linda Rodin of Rodin Olio Lusso
itunes:subtitle: Stylist and beauty entrepreneur Linda Rodin talks about her fabulous face oil and we ask her to weigh in on an important question: If we're talking about improving diversity in the beauty industry, shouldn't more mature women be represented, ...
description:
Stylist and beauty entrepreneur Linda Rodin talks about her fabulous face oil and we ask her to weigh in on an important question: If we're talking about improving diversity in the beauty industry, shouldn't more mature women be represented, too? Plus, when spokespeople go rogue, eye cream, and what's growing in your shower pouf.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
